tldr: Guest: Sarah Marzano (eMarketer) on in-store retail media: hype vs. traction.
Frameworks: evidence-first planning; retail media ladder of proof.
Contrarian: In-store attention ≠ incremental sales without disciplined design.
learn: What is actually working inside stores vs. slideware.
How to instrument incrementality for physical environments.
Where brands should focus test budgets next.
takeaways: Hiring: analysts who can run store-level experiments.

faq.a: Synthesis across retailer programs and third-party measurement.
Pre/post matched markets; SKU-level baselines; standardized readouts.
